name: SOLUS (QijunLi)
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

This project is aimed to discuss and explore ideas of loneliness.

SOLUS is aimed to give advice for people struggling with their mental health, yet also be a fun way to tackle a serious subject. The aim is for people to realise they are not alone in life, and not alone in their struggles. 

Overall, I hope this game can give people who are struggling a feeling of value, and knowing that there are support networks out there, people who care... people just like them. 

The game tries to be an interactive way of getting information across. 

It is inspired by the likes of limbo and inside.
